scene.name: a0
scene.directive: Lyralei offered an invitation to her sacred forest, which was gladly accepted.

scene.name: a1s02
scene.directive: Well, what do you think of my forest?

scene.name: a1s03
scene.directive: Before we go in, I want to show you something.

scene.name: a1s05
scene.directive: I finally found my very own Arcana!

scene.name: a1s06
scene.directive: It's an extremely rare flower that lets me become one with the wind.

scene.name: a1s10
scene.directive: Guess I don't need any clothes for that.

scene.name: a1s11
scene.directive: You want to see every detail...

scene.name: a1s12

scene.name: a1s16

scene.name: a2s09

scene.name: a2s15

scene.name: a2s16
